summary: This document is an order acknowledgment email from ADI to Fred Pridemore at Signet Technologies, Inc., confirming a large purchase of surveillance equipment totaling $102,598.83. The order was placed on August 20, 2019, and shipped to an address in New York, NY, with billing to Signet Technologies in Beltsville, MD.

persons.name: Fred Pridemore
persons.context: The email is addressed to Fred Pridemore, acknowledging an order for surveillance equipment placed by Signet Technologies, Inc.

events.title: Surveillance Equipment Order Placed
events.description: An order for surveillance cameras and mounting equipment totaling $102,598.83 was placed by Signet Technologies, Inc., and acknowledged by ADI.

locations: 12300 Kiln Court Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: A large order of surveillance equipment (cameras and mounts) worth $102,598.83 was placed on August 20, 2019.
The shipping address was 'MCC New York' at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The billing was to Signet Technologies, Inc. at 12300 Kiln Court Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705.
The purchase order number was FBP000391 and the reference number was JH-120489.
The equipment included 17 Q6055E/PTZ/1080P/X32/IP66 cameras and 75 Q8414LVS corner cameras.
